com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer.cool

Interface CoolPlayer


  • public interface CoolPlayer
    Definition of a Player used in cool. Besides common playback command (play(), pause(), etc), it provides the library necessary information about the playback and components.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CoolPlayer.ErrorListeners 
      static interface  CoolPlayer.EventListener
      A convenient callback to help CoolPlayer to listen to different playback states.

      static interface  CoolPlayer.OnVolumeChangeListener

      static class  CoolPlayer.VolumeChangeListeners

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerView

        @NonNull
android.view.View getPlayerView()

      • getCurrentPlaybackInfo

        @NonNull
PlaybackInfo getCurrentPlaybackInfo()

      • initialize

        void initialize(@NonNull
                Container container,
                @NonNull
                PlaybackInfo playbackInfo)
        Initialize resource for the incoming playback. After this point, CoolPlayer should be able to start the playback at anytime in the future (This doesn't mean that any call to play() will start the playback immediately. It can start buffering enough resource before any rendering).
        Parameters:
        container - the RecyclerView contains this Player.
        playbackInfo - initialize info for the preparation.

      • play

        void play()
        Start playback or resume from a pausing state.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause current playback.

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()

      • release

        void release()
        Tear down all the setup. This should release all player instances.

      • wantsToPlay

        boolean wantsToPlay()

      • getPlayerOrder

        int getPlayerOrder()
        Returns:
        prefer playback order in list. Can be customized.
